descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> conjure immense waves that crash into <target>, dealing damage equal to <damage> <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>. <Avoidable>.

name: Natures Bloom
description: You wrap yourself in protective leaves that lash out at the enemy dealing damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. Damage is doubled if the enemy is poisoned. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Poison that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's max hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s. On use, gives Regen that heals ${preHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of your current hitpoints over ${preHitEffect0duration}s. Avoidable.
descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> wrap yourself in protective leaves that lash out at <target> dealing damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit <count> times over <duration>. Damage is doubled if <target> is poisoned. On a hit, <hitEffect>. On use, <prehitEffect>. <Avoidable>.

name: Infernal Power
description: You create fractures in the earth that pursue the enemy and unleash lava from below. Deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% + 100% if the enemy is burning of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s. Avoidable.

descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> create ghostly tendrils that lash out at <target> dealing damage equal to <damage> <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>. <Avoidable>.

name: Dragon Storm Call

It discharges lightning onto the enemy dealing damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s.
